children.name: Value
children.value: Thank you for your representation, Mr. Jayoma.

children.name: Value
children.value: The jury has reached a verdict.

children.name: Value
children.value: They find the defendant guilty as charged.

children.name: Value
children.value: While we understand your efforts in this case, the court upholds the principle that there is no place for sexual offenders in our society.

children.name: Value
children.value: Mr. Jayoma, during your cross-examination, you questioned the lack of concrete evidence presented against your client.

children.name: Value
children.value: Do you wish to elaborate on this point for the court?

children.name: Value
children.value: This court is now in session, the Honorable Judge Cristofer, presiding.

children.name: Value
children.value: Mr. Jayoma and Mike, you are here before this court to present your cases regarding the serious allegations of sexual harassment against the defendant.

children.name: Value
children.value: Mr. Jayoma, your client has expressed significant concerns about the impact of these accusations on his personal and professional life.

children.name: Value
children.value: Please proceed with your opening statements, ensuring that these proceedings are conducted with the utmost respect and decorum.

children.name: Value
children.value: The court appreciates your thorough presentation, Mr. Jayoma.

children.name: Value
children.value: The jury has reached a verdict.

children.name: Value
children.value: They find in favor of the defendant, clearing him of all charges.

children.name: Value
children.value: We trust that justice has been served.
